name: ROBLOX 2008
description:
Credit to 4reeeal for the original 2009 ROBLOX style (https://userstyles.org/styles/122867/roblox-2009) and is compatible with the "Vote For Builderman" banner (https://userstyles.org/styles/126083/roblox-2008-builderman-for-president)

RIP Tix.

This design brings back the classic 2008 layout that many people first logged in to see. This iconic design was a icon of old ROBLOX and many users beg the admins to bring back this layout.
obsoletion_message: Check for the new reupload. I had to remake the code since that the code became global.
additional_info:
Credit to 4reeeal for the original 2009 ROBLOX style (https://userstyles.org/styles/122867/roblox-2009)

Download the original for the 2009 experience.

Tested compatible with his "Vote Builderman For President" Banner (https://userstyles.org/styles/126083/roblox-2008-builderman-for-president)
